Weather Briefing

Documentation

Forecast Products, Interpretation, and Discussion¶

Here are a variety of resources ranging from polished, professional forecast products to blogs and forecast discussions.

Forecast Products¶

NAV Canada GFA¶

GFA

hort range aviation forecast for Canada. Gives high resolution insight to frontal, precipitation, and cloud motion. Cannot take a nationwide look, only each GFA sector.

Text Products¶

FOCN45¶

prairiewx

The website I have listed here for access also provides the ECCC thunderstorm outlook in the same place (thanks to Ryan). The FOCN45 gives a broad overview of significant weather in western Canada over the coming few days.

NICC Monthly Seasonal Outlook¶

NA Outlook

3 month seasonal outlook with a focus on fire and drought conditions. Sections for Canada, Mexico, and USA. A focus is placed on blending teleconnections and seasonal forecast products.

Arctic Oscillation and Polar Vortex Blog by Dr. Judah Cohen¶

AO Blog

An in-depth look at the state of the northern hemisphere and the many teleconnections. A focus is placed on extreme and persistent temperature patterns.
